alert.note: Alert for Broward; Collier; Hendry; Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 16 at 11:53AM EST until January 16 at 12:30PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Collier County in southwestern Florida... Southeastern Hendry County in southern Florida... Broward County in southeastern Florida... Southwestern Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 1230 PM EST. * At 1152 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lake Harbor to near Miccosukee Service Plaza, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Plantation and Sunrise. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for southern, southeastern and southwestern Florida. Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into a small central room in a sturdy structure. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for southern, southeastern and southwestern Florida.
